spatial_accuracy.notes: General floor plan layout is followed, but several door and window orientations are incorrect. The transition from the utility area to the kitchen is handled as a window rather than an open entrance, and the balcony access door is missing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing the 'Utility' room enclosure as defined in the 2D plan; it has been integrated improperly. The foyer wall partitioning is slightly distorted compared to the plan's clean right angles.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mostly aligns with the plan (bed, dining table, kitchen counters). Wardrobe in bedroom is placed on the opposite wall intended for the closet. Dining chairs increased from 2 to 6, violating the plan's spatial economy.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality isometric rendering with consistent lighting and clean geometry. The orthographic projection is well-executed.

detected_errors.description: Missing entry door from the balcony to the living area.
Bathroom door swings into the living space instead of being tucked toward the hallway entrance as per plan.
Bedroom wardrobe is placed against the far wall instead of the designated niche wall.
Dining furniture set is over-scaled (6 chairs vs 2 in plan), crowding the living area.
The 'Utility' space is hallucinated as a window view rather than a functional interior room extension.
